text: José Aguilar Pulsar (24 November 1958 - 4 April 2014) was a Cuban boxer. He won the light-welterweight bronze medal at the 1980 Summer Olympics in Moscow, Soviet Union. Aguilar from a stroke on 4 April 2014 in Guantánamo, Guantánamo Province. He was 55 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * José Aguilar at Sports Reference Category:1958 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cuban boxers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Cuba Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Medalists at the 1980 Summer Olympics
title: José Aguilar (boxer)
